vista.graph
Interface SchematicDataModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
DSM2SchematicData
public interface SchematicDataModel

This interface is to be implemented by any class that wishes to provide data for the schematic. This interface requires the implementation to iterate over each symbol that needs to be drawn. The data required for drawing a particular symbol is encapsulated in the SymbolData class

Version:
$Id: SchematicDataModel.java,v 1.3 1999/12/15 16:29:12 nsandhu Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
See Also:
SymbolData
